orangeBanner.message: Receive Bitcoin and USDT without bureaucracy

about.title: About Us
about.description: Pague BIT was founded with the mission to simplify and democratize access to Bitcoin in Brazil. We are a team passionate about technology and innovation, committed to providing secure and efficient solutions for individuals and businesses looking to explore Bitcoin's potential.

trust.title: Trust and Security
trust.description: We prioritize the security of your funds and data, with advanced protection technologies.

speed.title: Speed and Efficiency
speed.description: Fast transactions and agile support so you can make the most of the Bitcoin world.

solutions.title: Complete Solutions
solutions.description: We offer everything you need to buy, sell, use, and accept Bitcoin.

buy.title: Buy Bitcoin
buy.description: Acquire Bitcoin quickly and securely, with various payment options.

store.title: Store Securely
store.description: Keep your Bitcoins in secure wallets, with full control over your keys.

accept.title: Accept Bitcoin
accept.description: Receive Bitcoin payments in your business, with simple and efficient solutions.
accept.imageAlt: Image representing accepting Bitcoin as payment

hero.title: Pague BIT: Your Complete Bitcoin Solution
hero.subtitle: We simplify the world of Bitcoin for businesses and individuals. We offer secure, fast, and easy solutions for you to buy, sell, store, and use Bitcoin.

1.title: Decentralized Digital Currency
1.description: Discover how Bitcoin enables peer-to-peer transactions without intermediaries, promoting financial autonomy.

2.title: Blockchain Security
2.description: Blockchain technology ensures the integrity and security of transactions, protecting your investment.

3.title: Limited Supply, Increasing Value
3.description: With a maximum supply of 21 million, Bitcoin stands out as a unique store of value.

buyBitcoinPage.heroTitle: Revolutionize Your Transactions with PagueBit P2P
buyBitcoinPage.heroDescription: A premium experience for buying and selling Bitcoin and USDT with security and innovation.

mainSection.title: Premium Experience
mainSection.description: At PagueBit, you enjoy a secure and innovative environment for P2P trading, with utmost integrity and exclusive support for Premium clients.
features: Ease and innovation in every transaction

recommendation.title: Recommendation
recommendation.description: If you prefer an anonymous and direct purchase, we recommend using Alfred for P2P transactions.

getStartedPage.heroDescription: Choose the profile that best suits your needs and begin your journey in the world of Bitcoin.

pf.title: For Individuals
pf.description: Start your Bitcoin journey in a simple and secure way. Ideal for individual investors and enthusiasts looking to enter the world of cryptocurrencies.

pj.title: For Businesses
